alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 23 at 9:09AM PDT until October 24 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Northern Trinity County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.
